msg.msgText: NOTES: 1. "Name","ConnectionPolicies","MessagingPolicies", "Port", and "MessageHub" are required items. 2. Each "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks. 3. To create a secured "Endpoint", specify "SecurityProfile". 4. Use "imaserver list Plugin" to get a list of installed Protocol plug-ins. 5. If a value has not been specified for MaxSendSize, the default value of 16384 will be used at runtime.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
